original_title: The Liquid Casket / Wilderness of Mirrors
overview: Clipson, like some reckless traveller driven by a Mabusian force, takes us on a journey, hypnotically guiding us through a realm of dreams that seems to consist solely of light, shapes and colours. Shot on and screened from film. Soundtrack by sound artist and composer Lawrence English.
title: The Liquid Casket / Wilderness of Mirrors
